entry.title: Flood Watch issued January 23 at 1:30PM EST until January 24 at 6:00AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: .Several waves of rainfall, Wednesday and again Thursday night, will produce a half to one inch of liquid. While a deeper snowpack will absorb some of this rain, there will be snowmelt yielding additional runoff into area creeks and streams, elevating their flow level. Recent reports have indicated ice formation on the Buffalo area creeks, as well as creeks and rivers in the western Southern Tier.
